text: To (allaha) pharmavila, dakhala vha jahannamamadhye, jinna ani manavancya samuhansobata, je tumacyapurvi ho'una geleta. Jevha ekhada samuha dakhala ho'ila, tevha dusarya samuhaca dhihkkara karila.Yetheparyanta ki jevha tya (jahannama) madhye sarvajana jama hotila tevha nantarace loka apalya agodara gelelyanvisayi mhanatila ki, he amacya palanakartya! Yannica amhala margabhrasta kele. Tu yanna jahannamaci duppata siksa de. (Allaha) pharmavila ki sarvansathi duppata siksa ahe, parantu tumhi janata nahi
